I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (n : nat) (ns : list nat) (m : nat) (ms : list nat), fusion (Cons nat n ns) (Cons nat m ms) = si (list nat) (inf_egal n m) (Cons nat n (fusion ns (Cons nat m ms))) (Cons nat m (fusion (Cons nat n ns) ms))

Premises:
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
Inductive list (X : Set) : Set := Nil : list X | Cons : X -> list X -> list X Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments Nil _%type_scope Arguments Cons _%type_scope
Cons : forall X : Set, X -> list X -> list X
inf_egal = fix inf_egal (n m : nat) {struct n} : bool := match n with | 0 => true | S n0 => match m with | 0 => false | S m0 => inf_egal n0 m0 end end : nat -> nat -> bool Arguments inf_egal (_ _)%nat_scope
fusion = fix fusion (x y : list nat) {struct x} : list nat := match x with | @Nil _ => y | @Cons _ n l0 => (fix fusion_r (y0 : list nat) : list nat := match y0 with | @Nil _ => x | @Cons _ n0 l2 => si (list nat) (inf_egal n n0) (Cons nat n (fusion l0 (Cons nat n0 l2))) (Cons nat n0 (fusion_r l2)) end) y end : list nat -> list nat -> list nat
si : forall X : Set, bool -> X -> X -> X
fusion_eq2 : forall (n : nat) (ns : list nat), fusion (Cons nat n ns) (Nil nat) = Cons nat n ns
bubble_eq3 : forall (n m : nat) (x : list nat), bubble (Cons nat n (Cons nat m x)) = si (list nat) (inf_egal n m) (Cons nat n (bubble (Cons nat m x))) (Cons nat m (bubble (Cons nat n x)))
ins_eq2 : forall (n m : nat) (x : list nat), ins n (Cons nat m x) = si (list nat) (inf_egal n m) (Cons nat n (Cons nat m x)) (Cons nat m (ins n x))
ins = fix ins (n : nat) (l : list nat) {struct l} : list nat := match l with | @Nil _ => Cons nat n (Nil nat) | @Cons _ m x => si (list nat) (inf_egal n m) (Cons nat n (Cons nat m x)) (Cons nat m (ins n x)) end : nat -> list nat -> list nat Arguments ins _%nat_scope
sorted_eq3 : forall (n m : nat) (x : list nat), sorted (Cons nat n (Cons nat m x)) = (inf_egal n m = true /\ sorted (Cons nat m x))
nocc_Cons_Cons : forall (n m p : nat) (x : list nat), nocc n (Cons nat m (Cons nat p x)) = nocc n (Cons nat p (Cons nat m x))
sorted_inf : forall (n m : nat) (x : list nat), sorted (Cons nat n (Cons nat m x)) -> inf_egal n m = true
nocc_eq2 : forall (n m : nat) (x : list nat), nocc n (Cons nat m x) = si nat (egal_nat n m) (S (nocc n x)) (nocc n x)
nocc_Cons : forall (n m : nat) (x y : list nat), nocc n x = nocc n y -> nocc n (Cons nat m x) = nocc n (Cons nat m y)
sorted_ins_Cons : forall (x : list nat) (n m : nat), inf_egal n m = false -> sorted (Cons nat m x) -> sorted (Cons nat m (ins n x))
bubble_aux = fix bubble_aux (x : list nat) (n : nat) {struct x} : list nat := match x with | @Nil _ => Cons nat n (Nil nat) | @Cons _ n0 l => si (list nat) (inf_egal n n0) (Cons nat n (bubble_aux l n0)) (Cons nat n0 (bubble_aux l n)) end : list nat -> nat -> list nat Arguments bubble_aux _ _%nat_scope
nocc_ins : forall (x : list nat) (n m : nat), nocc n (ins m x) = nocc n (Cons nat m x)
tri_ins_eq2 : forall (n : nat) (x : list nat), tri_ins (Cons nat n x) = ins n (tri_ins x)
sorted_cdr : forall (n : nat) (x : list nat), sorted (Cons nat n x) -> sorted x
bubble_eq2 : forall n : nat, bubble (Cons nat n (Nil nat)) = Cons nat n (Nil nat)
sorted_eq2 : forall n : nat, sorted (Cons nat n (Nil nat)) = True
nocc = fix nocc (n : nat) (l : list nat) {struct l} : nat := match l with | @Nil _ => 0 | @Cons _ m x => si nat (egal_nat n m) (S (nocc n x)) (nocc n x) end : nat -> list nat -> nat Arguments nocc _%nat_scope
bubble_sort0 = fix bubble_sort0 (n : nat) (x : list nat) {struct n} : list nat := match n with | 0 => x | S n0 => bubble_sort0 n0 (bubble x) end : nat -> list nat -> list nat Arguments bubble_sort0 _%nat_scope
tri_ins = fix tri_ins (l : list nat) : list nat := match l with | @Nil _ => Nil nat | @Cons _ n x => ins n (tri_ins x) end : list nat -> list nat
nocc_tri_ins : forall (x : list nat) (n : nat), nocc n x = nocc n (tri_ins x)
ins_eq1 : forall n : nat, ins n (Nil nat) = Cons nat n (Nil nat)
Nat.shiftl = fun a : (fun _ : nat => nat) 0 => nat_rect (fun _ : nat => nat) a (fun _ : nat => Nat.double) : (fun _ : nat => nat) 0 -> forall n : nat, (fun _ : nat => nat) n Arguments Nat.shiftl (_ _)%nat_scope
Nat.tail_add = fix tail_add (n m : nat) {struct n} : nat := match n with | 0 => m | S n0 => tail_add n0 (S m) end : nat -> nat -> nat Arguments Nat.tail_add (_ _)%nat_scope
Nat.add = fix add (n m : nat) {struct n} : nat := match n with | 0 => m | S p => S (add p m) end : nat -> nat -> nat Arguments Nat.add (_ _)%nat_scope
Fin.eqb_nat_eq : forall (m n : nat) (p : Fin.t m) (q : Fin.t n), Fin.eqb p q = true -> m = n
Nat.pow = fix pow (n m : nat) {struct m} : nat := match m with | 0 => 1 | S m0 => n * pow n m0 end : nat -> nat -> nat Arguments Nat.pow (_ _)%nat_scope
sorted_ins : forall (n : nat) (x : list nat), sorted x -> sorted (ins n x)
Nat.sub = fix sub (n m : nat) {struct n} : nat := match n with | 0 => n | S k => match m with | 0 => n | S l => sub k l end end : nat -> nat -> nat Arguments Nat.sub (_ _)%nat_scope
Nat.mul = fix mul (n m : nat) {struct n} : nat := match n with | 0 => 0 | S p => m + mul p m end : nat -> nat -> nat Arguments Nat.mul (_ _)%nat_scope
Inductive le (n : nat) : nat -> Prop := le_n : n <= n | le_S : forall m : nat, n <= m -> n <= S m Arguments le (_ _)%nat_scope Arguments le_n _%nat_scope Arguments le_S (_ _)%nat_scope
Nat.tail_addmul = fix tail_addmul (r n m : nat) {struct n} : nat := match n with | 0 => r | S n0 => tail_addmul (Nat.tail_add m r) n0 m end : nat -> nat -> nat -> nat Arguments Nat.tail_addmul (_ _ _)%nat_scope
Nat.max = fix max (n m : nat) {struct n} : nat := match n with | 0 => m | S n' => match m with | 0 => n | S m' => S (max n' m') end end : nat -> nat -> nat Arguments Nat.max (_ _)%nat_scope
sorted = fix sorted (l : list nat) : Prop := match l with | @Nil _ => True | @Cons _ n (@Nil _) => True | @Cons _ n (@Cons _ m _ as l0) => inf_egal n m = true /\ sorted l0 end : list nat -> Prop
bubble = fun x : list nat => match x with | @Nil _ => Nil nat | @Cons _ n l => bubble_aux l n end : list nat -> list nat
list_rect : forall (X : Set) (P : list X -> Type), P (Nil X) -> (forall (x : X) (l : list X), P l -> P (Cons X x l)) -> forall l : list X, P l
list_rec : forall (X : Set) (P : list X -> Set), P (Nil X) -> (forall (x : X) (l : list X), P l -> P (Cons X x l)) -> forall l : list X, P l
list_sind : forall (X : Set) (P : list X -> SProp), P (Nil X) -> (forall (x : X) (l : list X), P l -> P (Cons X x l)) -> forall l : list X, P l
list_ind : forall (X : Set) (P : list X -> Prop), P (Nil X) -> (forall (x : X) (l : list X), P l -> P (Cons X x l)) -> forall l : list X, P l
Nat.div2 = fix div2 (n : nat) : nat := match n with | S (S n') => S (div2 n') | _ => 0 end : nat -> nat Arguments Nat.div2 _%nat_scope
PeanoNat.Nat.double_induction : forall R : nat -> nat -> Prop, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq (Morphisms.respectful eq iff)) R -> (forall m : nat, R 0 m) -> (forall n : nat, R (S n) 0) -> (forall n m : nat, R n m -> R (S n) (S m)) -> forall n m : nat, R n m

```coq
intros n ns m ms. simpl. rewrite -> fusion_eq2. simpl. rewrite -> fusion_eq2. simpl. rewrite -> bubble_eq3. simpl. rewrite -> nocc_eq2. simpl. rewrite -> sorted_eq3. simpl. rewrite -> sorted_inf. reflexivity.
Qed. 
```
